sentences.en: C warmer in the market, but the business card printing business or encumber its growth.
sentences.cn: 市场的回暖, 但制卡业务或拖累了其业绩成长.

sentences.en: He died in 1874, heavily encumbered by debt.
He shall not encumber his brain with the coil of rhythm and number.
sentences.cn: 他绝不能使自己的脑子受累于纠缠不清的格律和韵律.

sentences.en: I don't want encumber myself with unnecessary luggage.
sentences.cn: 我不想使自己受不必要的行李拖累.

sentences.en: One should not encumber oneself with hire purchase repayments at the beginning of a marriage.
sentences.cn: 人不应该在婚姻的开始就被购买的租金拖累.

sentences.en: The anti - fatigue effects of sea encumber polypeptide on mice was studied at different dose.
sentences.cn: 摘要通过采用不同浓度的海参肽灌胃,研究海参肽对小鼠的 抗 疲劳作用.

sentences.en: They can't encumber us on the road.
sentences.cn: 他们不会在路上拖累大家.

sentences.en: They would interrupt and encumber me.

trans.tran_en: to make it difficult for you to do something or for something to happen
